title: BRAVE Watch
summary: The ultimate watch face for BRAVE Eve pilots!
description: The ultimate watch face for BRAVE Eve pilots!* Show off your BRAVE affiliation on your shiny wearable device* We all know that Eve is real, time to make UTC the timezone you live inWarning: This watch face always shows time as UTC/GMT/Eve time!
descriptionHTML:
The ultimate watch face for BRAVE Eve pilots!

* Show off your BRAVE affiliation on your shiny wearable device
* We all know that Eve is real, time to make UTC the timezone you live in

Warning: This watch face always shows time as UTC/GMT/Eve time!
comments: When I look at my wrist, I know it's time to fly dangerously   7o
Interchangeable colors? The ability to change the accent colors would be nice, or maybe just variants of the application with different colors.
Love it Really enjoy it, pictures show it all
Does not show up in android apps
recentChanges: * Deliver two watch faces (UTC vs local time)
* Show both TZ in one face
